title: In Session With Marc David: Food Intolerances & Hashimotoâ€™s - Learning What (and What Not) to Eat
itunes:title: In Session With Marc David: Food Intolerances & Hashimotoâ€™s - Learning What (and What Not) to Eat
description:
Do you have a nutrition-linked health condition? Then you wonâ€™t want to miss this weekâ€™s episode of The Psychology of Eating Podcast, where youâ€™ll hear the story of 44-year old Aldona from the Netherlands.
Â 
Ten years ago, Aldona was diagnosed with Hashimotoâ€™s thyroiditis, a diagnosis that affects an estimated 20 million people in the U.S. alone. When she was newly diagnosed, Aldona tried to heal her condition with high-quality foods. She has tried many diet approaches, like Paleo, and has done strict elimination diets in an attempt to see which foods might be most problematic.
Â 
Unfortunately, none of her attempts have improved her Hashimotoâ€™s. And now, to complicate things, Aldona has developed Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS), which she attributes to the stress of trying to manage her Hashimotoâ€™s. Never having experienced digestive issues or food intolerances before, Aldona has become stressed out and very confused about what to eat. In her words, she no longer trusts her instincts about which foods are best for her.
Â 
In their coaching session, master eating psychology coach Marc David helps Aldona look beyond nutritional solutions. How are these conditions asking Aldona to transform as a human being? How can she learn to quiet her mind, and tune into what her body needs? In what ways can she discover how to live with these conditions, while improving her quality of life and nurturing herself along the way?
Â 
---------------
Â 
Learn more about us at The Institute for the Psychology of Eating: https://psychologyofeating.com/Â 
Â 
Listen to Marc share about the Mind Body Eating Coach Certification Training, our 8-month coach certification training for aspiring health coaches and established practitioners. Be part of the worldwide movement of coaches helping others transform their understanding of food and body challenges, and finally find freedom with food. Tune into The Ultimate Health Coach webinar here: https://psychologyofeating.com/become-a-coach-h/ Â 
Â 
Or, take our 8-week public program, Transform Your Relationship with Food, if youâ€™re looking to transform your own relationship with food. Youâ€™ll learn our uplifting and life-changing approach to ending eating challenges like emotional eating, binge eating, weight, chronic dieting, body image, food worry, and nutrition-linked disorders such as fatigue, digestive concerns, autoimmune disorders, and more. Learn more here: https://psychologyofeating.com/online-retreats-2/
Â 
Follow us on social:Â 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IPEfanpage
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eatingpsychology/
- Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/eatingpsych
Â 
#psychologyofeating #foodpsychology #nutrition #hashimotos #ibs #digestiveissues #eliminationdiet #foodintolerance #foodworry #intuitiveeating
